short-descr: As a software engineer with a passion for innovation, I create modern, high-performance websites tailored to your needs. With experience in embedded systems and engineering, I also offer solutions for technical projects. Additionally, I provide instructional services to help individuals or teams build their technical skills. Feel free to reach out for a consultation!
services-h2: What I Can Do for You
services-ul:
• ✔️ Custom Website Design & Development
  • ✔️ Frontend & Backend Programming
  • ✔️ Embedded Systems Development
  • ✔️ UI/UX Design
  • ✔️ Technical Consultation & Instruction
  • ✔️ Python/C# Programming using different IDEs
  • ✔️ Technical Writing & Documentation
  • ✔️ Consultation
profile:
Personal Profile

Innovative software engineer with a strong technical foundation, blending creativity, programming, and problem-solving. Passionate about software development and engineering design, eager to learn from experienced mentors and apply skills to real-world challenges.
